title: Peter Lehmann logo font - generated in Australia
author: akasdin

comments.content:
Can't find a match to the |P|; |eter| looks like Sloop Script Two, by Font Bureau:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/sloop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073403/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/sloop/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/sloop/")
